transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee with tour restoration ministries got
a good very productive two hours out
here several one-on-one divine
appointments and witnessing here at psu
and so many spirits out here it's
unbelievable so many evil spirits in any
case there was one little altercation
where the police came out where a
heckler wanted to punch me because he
didn't understand what Andrew was saying
to me and anyway he repented he
apologized and everything was worked out
so even that turned out to be really
good the only bad heckler that was out
here was hand ruined he was just out
here to cause problems because he's
wicked but I had a good interaction with
Brendan with the guy he wanted to punch
me which I forget his name now and with
several other students it was actually
really really good day so thank you for
your prayers I filmed several podcast
out here at PSU it seems like even this
though serves up the spirits within
people I can't believe the police came
out on a day when all i'm doing is
filming podcast but he can make Andrew
for that he called the police anyway
hallelujah God's good the police never
interacted with me they just hung out
hung out in the back of them I left
after like 10 or 15 minutes I think they
just heard about what happened with this
heckler but in any case Yas good I was
able to talk to several students to
several witnessing and film several
podcasts out here so amen even during
finals week yeah spirit is working and
moving here at campus oh I forgot there
was one guy this was like the best
interaction I had of the entire day
there was one guy that came up to me
that said can I have a hug and I said I
will give you a hug if you agree to read
the book of John all 21 chapters and
sincerely ask you ought to show you who
this man Yahshua is and he said I will
do it so I hugged him I sincerely hugged
him and he said okay I'll do I'll read
the book of John but I also want your
website gardening said hallelujah hi so
but it's more important to go read the
book of John than it is to go to my
website so that was really awesome so
pray for him hallelujah well yah blessed
Shalom this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries
three more days left to come out to psu
during finals week before my ministry
here is done at PSU and will go
elsewhere this is daniel john lee with
tour restoration ministries again the
websites www spirit and tour com Shalom
